product.title: LUBA Mammotion Reversible Blades
product.short_description: The LUBA Mammotion reversible blades are made for the LUBA robot mowers engineered with the highest concern for safety to prevent breakage and thereby blade debris from being scattered on the lawn.
product.long_description: The LUBA Mammotion reversible blades are made for the LUBA robot mowers engineered with the highest concern for safety to prevent breakage and thereby blade debris from being scattered on the lawn. Made from stainless steel, the blades provide a longer cutting lifespan, reducing the frequency of blade replacements for the owner. These blades come in packs of 16 pcs, 32 pcs, or 300 pcs for service centers.
